# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_executable(cloud-blockstore-libs-storage-disk_registry-ut)

)

  core-testlib-basics
)

  -ldl
  -lrt
  -Wl,--no-as-needed
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -lpthread
  -lrt
  -ldl
)

)
